LanguageData.WorldCameraMovement.label: World view camera movement
LanguageData.WorldCameraMovement.helpText: Zoom with the MOUSE WHEEL or {Key:MapZoom_In} and {Key:MapZoom_Out} keys.\n\nPan with the {Key:MapDolly_Up}-{Key:MapDolly_Left}-{Key:MapDolly_Down}-{Key:MapDolly_Right} keys, or by MIDDLE-CLICKING and DRAGGING.
